title: Apple Looks Beyond Big Law to Fight Mounting Tech Court Battles - Bloomberg Law
content: Apple Looks Beyond Big Law to Fight Mounting Tech Court Battles  Bloomberg Law
description: Apple Inc. tapped outside law firms more than three times as often as large tech rivals last year, leaning on Big Law but also regional specialists to fend off claims ranging from patent infringement to charges its App Store is an illegal monopoly, a Bloomberg Law analysis shows.
